Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. -- 4 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a four (4) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027 (an estimated $576,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and supporting the public health units in the Parish, including equipment required therefor?
